relation: Miguel Tejada grounded out short to first. None on with one out and Freddy Sanchez due up.
Freddy Sanchez ground-rule double to left. Runner on second with one out and Emmanuel Burriss due up.
Emmanuel Burriss popped out to second. Runner on second with two outs and Nate Schierholtz due up.
Nate Schierholtz single to right scored Freddy Sanchez with two out. On the play, Nate Schierholtz advances to second on the throw. Runner on second and Cody Ross due up.
Cody Ross intentionally walked. Runners on first and second with two outs and Brandon Crawford due up.
Brandon Crawford single to left scored Nate Schierholtz with two out. On the play, Cody Ross advances to third on the throw. Runners on first and third and Eli Whiteside due up.
Eli Whiteside popped out to short to end the inning.
